1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Encode and decode integers.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Overture.Text.Integer
6  ( -- * Decoder
7    stringDec, stringInt, stringInteger,
8    stringHex, stringHexInt, stringHexInteger,
9    -- * Encoder
10    intLowerHexString, intUpperHexString,
11  ) where
12
13import qualified Data.Char                      as Ch
14import qualified Numeric                        as Num
15
16
17-- ----------------------  Decoder
18
19stringMaybe :: (String -> [(a, String)]) -> String -> Maybe a
20stringMaybe f s = case f s of
21                  [(x, "")] -> Just x
22                  _         -> Nothing
23
24-- | Decode decimal integer.
25stringDec :: (Eq n, Num n) => String -> Maybe n
26stringDec = stringMaybe Num.readDec
27
28-- | Decode decimal integer as 'Int'.
29--
30--   >>> stringInt "12"
31--   Just 12
32--
33--   >>> stringInt "12.3"
34--   Nothing
35--
36--   >>> stringInt "12345678901234567890"
37--   Just (-6101065172474983726)
38--
39stringInt :: String -> Maybe Int
40stringInt = stringDec
41
42-- | Decode decimal integer as 'Integer'.
43--
44--   >>> stringInteger "12345678901234567890"
45--   Just 12345678901234567890
46--
47stringInteger :: String -> Maybe Integer
48stringInteger = stringDec
49
50-- | Decode hexadecimal digits.
51stringHex :: (Eq n, Num n) => String -> Maybe n
52stringHex = stringMaybe Num.readHex
53
54-- | Decode hexadecimal digits as 'Int'.
55--
56--   >>> stringHexInt "0F"
57--   Just 15
58--
59stringHexInt :: String -> Maybe Int
60stringHexInt = stringHex
61
62-- | Decode hexadecimal digits as 'Integer'.
63--
64--   >>> stringHexInteger "0F"
65--   Just 15
66--
67stringHexInteger :: String -> Maybe Integer
68stringHexInteger = stringHex
69
70
71-- ----------------------  Encoder
72
73integralLowerHexString :: (Integral n, Show n) => n -> String
74integralLowerHexString n = Num.showHex n ""
75
76integralUpperHexString :: (Integral n, Show n) => n -> String
77integralUpperHexString = map Ch.toUpper . integralLowerHexString
78
79-- | Encode integer to hexadecimal string.
80--
81--   >>> intHexString 15
82--   "f"
83--
84intLowerHexString :: Int -> String
85intLowerHexString = integralLowerHexString
86
87-- | Encode integer to hexadecimal string.
88--
89--   >>> intUpperHexString 15
90--   "F"
91--
92intUpperHexString :: Int -> String
93intUpperHexString = integralUpperHexString
